item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description:
For a quick cheatshee, check out https://simplemde.com/markdown-guide.

This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

title: I like Bears link: i-like-bears alias: 2012/01/02/cool-post.html canonical_url: https://brunescu.com/i-like-bears published_date: 2022-12-30 is_page: false meta_description: Bears are pretty cool, according to science. meta_image: https://i.imgur.com/3jxqrKP.jpeg tags: bears, writing, thoughts make_discoverable: true class_name: bear-style Here is my article outlining why bears are dope.
